title: How to Create a Driver in Need for Speed

methods.name: Creating a Driver in Need for Speed World

steps.headline: Launch Need for Speed World.
steps.description: You can launch the game from the Start menu or desktop, if you created a shortcut there during setup.

steps.headline: Log into your account.
steps.description:
Enter your username and password into the fields provided, and click “Sign in.”
After logging in, NFSW will initiate an update. As soon as NFSW has finished downloading and installing all the required updates from the Internet, a dialog box with a “Play” button will appear.

steps.headline: Go to the Select a Driver page.
steps.description: Click on the “Play” button, and press “Enter” or any other key when prompted. You will be taken to the Select a Driver page.

steps.headline: Click the “Create a Driver” button.
steps.description: Now you can start the process of creating a new driver profile.

steps.headline: Name your driver.
steps.description: Enter the name you would like to use for your driver in the “Enter a Driver Name” field. On the Select a Driver Picture pane of the same screen, choose a picture for your driver from the ones provided. Click the “Next” button at the bottom of the page when you're done.

steps.headline: Select a car for your driver.
steps.description: On the next page, you will be allowed to choose a car you can purchase with your SpeedBoost. SpeedBoost is the currency used in NFS World, and you are given 200,000 of this when you create a new driver. Click on a model from the Car Models list, and click “Purchase Car” at the bottom of the page to buy the car. A dialog box will pop up asking you to confirm purchasing the car. Click “Yes” to confirm and return to the Select a Driver page.

steps.headline: Start using the new driver.
steps.description: On the Select a Driver page, click “Enter World” to enter NFS World and start racing as the Driver you just created!

methods.name: Creating a Driver in Need for Speed Hot Pursuit (PC)

steps.headline: Launch the game.
steps.description: You can launch the game by clicking its program icon from the Windows Start menu (Start button  >> All Programs >> EA Games >> Need for Speed Hot Pursuit).

steps.headline: Press Enter once the game loads.
steps.description: This will display the Main Menu.

steps.headline: Access the Driver Profile page.
steps.description: On the Main Menu, click “Options” then scroll right (using the right arrow button) till you arrive at the Driver Profile page.

steps.headline: Create a new driver.
steps.description: On the Driver Profile page, click “New driver profile.” A dialog box will appear where you can name your driver.

steps.headline: Name your driver.
steps.description: Click on the text field in the dialog box, and enter the name you would like to use for your driver. Click “OK” when you're done. Confirm the new name by clicking “OK” again.

steps.headline: Exit the Driver Profile page.
steps.description: Click “Back” at the bottom of the Driver Profile page to exit back to the Main Menu. You can now race using the driver name that you created!

methods.name: Creating a Driver in Need for Speed Shift (PC)

steps.headline: Launch the game.
steps.description: You can launch the game from the Start menu (Start Button >> Games >> Need for Speed Shift), or you can also launch it from the desktop by double-clicking its icon, if you have it installed there.

steps.headline: Select your language.
steps.description:
A language selection page will be displayed. Scroll down the options and highlight the language you want to use. Press Enter to select the language to load the game
When the game finishes loading, a Driver profile selection page with a list of all available Drivers will be displayed.

steps.headline: Create a new driver.
steps.description: Click the option labelled “New Game” to create a new Driver profile. You will be prompted to type the name of your new Driver. Do so in the provided box, and press Enter. NFS Shift will create a new Driver profile with the name you entered, and launch a new racing career under it. To race as a different Driver, quit (by pressing Alt+F4) and relaunch the game, and then select the Driver name you want from the Driver profile selection page.
